name: Steam Boi
description:
Description:

You play as a train on an endless track constantly moving forward. On the track, there are obstacles you must avoid by jumping around them. You get points for staying on the track and try to get the most amount of points.

How To Play:

The train can jump up to three times. Occasionally, the three jumps will not be necessary.

Your goal is to avoid obstacles that come your way and get the highest score possible. Press space to jump and press the left and right arrow keys to move the train back and forth. Touching any of the obstacles will obliterate the train and cause the game to end.
